Probabilistic Graph Management and Application Seminar

Announcements

If you are interested in database research, you are welcome to join us in our quarterly seminar. Each time a local or visiting researcher gives a talk on their research topic.

Location/Time: TBD.

Course Number: If you are a student and plan to attend, you can enroll in CSE 239A for 1 credit.

Mailing List: Announcements about the seminar are sent to the mailing list. To get subscribed, please submit this Google Form.
